name: Chill Frog and Pong
description:
Play in full screen PLEASE

Keyboard controls: Left, Right, X and Z

2-in-1 games.

Spinner pong: a spin.. on the classic pong game. Quite basic with lots of bugs (ball moves too fast), but is a lot of fun as a proof of concept

Chill Frog: Quite a cool concept that I could not help but to make a game out of it. Five levels showing different platforming concepts using spinners as controls. Plus you can't help but respect the frog. Leave me a comment on what you think. Thanks for playing and big thanks for IMS and Wonderville crew for hosting the game jam
